alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 10:02AM PST until December 28 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Jackson County, including Medford, Ashland, Gold Hill, Rogue River, Jacksonville and Applegate. All of Eastern Douglas County Foothills, including Steamboat and Toketee Falls. Central Douglas County and Eastern Curry County and Josephine County, including Roseburg, Grants Pass, Cave junction, Camas Valley, Elkton, and Drain. Winter impacts are expected for all area roads and highways. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. * Carry tire chains and be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities. * See https://www.tripcheck.com for latest road conditions. * A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means that periods of snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills; Jackson County
